entry.title: Rare Essence Diffusers for Home & Car
entry.summary:
Vendor: Rare Essence
Type: Diffusers
Price: 4.00 - 53.00 (5 variants)

NEW! Lotus Diffuser from Rare Essence will passively diffuse this beautiful blend and requires no plug in to do so! Simply pour the essential oil into the base, place the lotus flower on top and it will begin to release the aroma into the air as it absorbs the essential oil blend.

entry.title: Rare Essence Uplifting Reed Diffuser
entry.summary:
Vendor: Rare Essence
Type: Aromatherapy
Price: 29.95

“Very little grows on jagged rock. Be grounded. Be crumbled so wildflowers will come up where you are.” – Rumi

Our rareESSENCE Uplifting reed diffusers feature an exclusive blend of Spearmint, Peppermint, and Sweet Orange 100% Pure Essential Oils.

Diffusing essential oils is a simple way to incorporate them into your environment with maximum benefit. To diffuse and create a spa-like experience, remove the cork and place the reeds into the rareESSENCE oil blend – you can be sure these blends contain absolutely no solvents, alcohol, petrochemicals, or phthalates!

We suggest rotating the reeds after the first hour and anytime for an extra burst of aroma. Contained within hand-blown Italian glass bottles, both sizes are colourfully decorated. The large 90ml also features a beautiful quote matching the energy of the rareESSENCE signature blends!

Large 90ml Reed Diffuser (with poetic quote).
